title: Background
description: Provide context about the South African health datasets and establish CRISP-DM methodology as the project framework. Include overview of dataset domains and research context.

title: Business Objectives and Success Criteria Definition
description: Clearly define the business problem and objectives. Identify stakeholders and their requirements. Determine success criteria for the project and establish KPIs for evaluation.

title: Inventory of Resources Assessment
description: Create inventory of all available project resources: datasets, analytical tools, team expertise, time constraints, and technical infrastructure.

title: Risks, Assumptions, and Constraints Analysis
description: Identify project assumptions, risks, and constraints. Document potential issues with data quality, sampling bias, resource limitations, and define mitigation strategies.

title: Data Mining Goals and Success Criteria
description: Define specific data mining objectives and analytical goals. Establish technical success criteria for data analysis, pattern identification, and model development.
deliverables: Data Mining Goals and Success Criteria

title: Comprehensive Data Description
description: Create detailed descriptions of all HDPSA datasets including variable definitions, data types, value ranges, and structural characteristics.

title: Data Exploration and Visualization
description: Conduct exploratory data analysis across all datasets. Create visualizations showing distributions, relationships, and patterns using Power BI and other tools.

title: Data Quality Assessment
description: Perform data quality assessment including missing values, outlier detection, consistency checks, and completeness evaluation. Document quality issues and preparation recommendations.
